languages.text: "Хейнрикс никогда так не ошибался, как когда сделал своим агентом такое ничтожество".
"Heinrix was never more wrong than when he chose such a pathetic creature to be his agent."
languages.original_text: "Хейнрикс никогда так не ошибался, как когда сделал своим агентом такое ничтожество".

traits.locale_text: "Heinrix was never more wrong than when he chose such a pathetic creature to be his agent."

languages.text: 「こんな情けない生き物を工作員に選ぶとは、ハインリックスにとって最大のミスだだ」
languages.original_text: "Heinrix was never more wrong than when he chose such a pathetic creature to be his agent."

traits.locale_text: 「こんな情けない生き物を工作員に選ぶとは、ハインリックスにとって最大のミスだだ」

languages.text: “海因里希居然会选你这样的可怜虫当他的特工，他可真是大错特错。”
languages.original_text: "Heinrix was never more wrong than when he chose such a pathetic creature to be his agent."

traits.locale_text: “海因里希居然会选你这样的可怜虫当他的特工，他可真是大错特错。”

languages.text: «Heinrix no ha cometido nunca peor error que elegir a una criatura tan patética como su agente».
languages.original_text: "Heinrix was never more wrong than when he chose such a pathetic creature to be his agent."

traits.locale_text: «Heinrix no ha cometido nunca peor error que elegir a una criatura tan patética como su agente».

languages.text: "Heinrix hat nie einen schlimmeren Fehler begangen, als diese erbärmliche Kreatur zu seinem Agenten zu machen."
languages.original_text: "Heinrix was never more wrong than when he chose such a pathetic creature to be his agent."

traits.locale_text: "Heinrix hat nie einen schlimmeren Fehler begangen, als diese erbärmliche Kreatur zu seinem Agenten zu machen."

languages.text: « Heinrix a vraiment eu tort de faire d'une créature aussi pathétique un agent. »
languages.original_text: "Heinrix was never more wrong than when he chose such a pathetic creature to be his agent."

traits.locale_text: « Heinrix a vraiment eu tort de faire d'une créature aussi pathétique un agent. »

languages.text: "Heinrix'in en büyük hatası, böylesine zavallı bir yaratığı casusu olarak seçmekti."
languages.original_text: "Heinrix was never more wrong than when he chose such a pathetic creature to be his agent."

traits.locale_text: "Heinrix'in en büyük hatası, böylesine zavallı bir yaratığı casusu olarak seçmekti."
